name: DataAnalysisAgent
prompt_template: Analyze the following data and provide insights: $.input

name: RecommendationAgent
prompt_template: Based on the analysis, provide actionable recommendations for: $.input

name: QualityAssuranceAgent
prompt_template: Review and validate the quality of the response for: $.input

name: SummaryAgent
prompt_template: Summarize the key points and create a final response for: $.input
